description: A bash script that writes the current date and time to a log file every 7 seconds with progress display.

features.name: Write Timestamp
features.description: Writes current date and time to '../log.txt' every 7 seconds.

features.name: Progress Display
features.description: Shows 'Write to Log' with accumulating dots (up to six) on the display to indicate activity.

features.name: File Locking
features.description: Uses file locking to prevent simultaneous write/read conflicts on '../log.txt'.

operating_environment: Unix-like shell with bash and flock
